Translations.Text: so-d! A sikhamana apata kura'anana soganda
jo ke inkara karanara'o ahankara ane vivada kari rahya che
ame temanathi pahela pana ghani komone nasta kari didhi, te'o ciso padava lagya, parantu te samaya chutakarano na hato
ane inkara karanara'one e vata para asvarya thayum ke temana manthi ja eka, te'one saceta karanara avyo ane kaheva lagya ke a to jadugara ane juththo che
sum tene atala badha pujyono eka ja pujya kari didho, kharekhara a to asvaryajanaka vata che
temana agevano evum kahetam calava lagya ke, calo ane potana pujyo para adaga raho. Ni:Sanka a vata ko'i hetu mate kahevamam avi rahi che
ame to avi vata pahelana dinamam pana nathi sambhali, kami nathi basa! Ato ghadi kadheli vato che
sum apana manthi phakta ana para ja allahani vani avatarita karavamam avi? Jo ke a loko mari vahi para sanka kari rahya che, jo ke (satya e che ke) te loko'e haju sudhi maro prakopa cakhyo ja nathi
athava sum temani pase tara jabaradasta palanaharani krpana khajana che
athava sum akasa ane dharati ane te banne vacceni dareka vastuni badasahata temani ja che, pachi to te loko doradum bandhi cadhi jaya
a pana (mota mota) laskaro manthi hari gayelum (nanum) laskara che
temana pahela pana nuha ane adani koma ane khuntavala phira'aune juthalavya hata
ane samudana loko, lutani komana loko'e pana ane ayakahana rahevasi'o'e pana, a ja (mota) laskaro hata
temana manthi eka pana eva na hata jemane payagambarone na juthalavya hoya, basa! Mari yatana temana mate sabita tha'i ga'i
Te loko basa! Eka cisani raha jo'i rahya che, jemam thodika pana vara nahim lage
ane te loko'e kahyum ke, he amara palanahara! Amane amaro bhaga kayamatana divasa pahela ja api de
tame temani vato para dhiraja rakho ane amara banda da'uda a.Sa.Ne yada karo, je khuba ja saktisali hata, ni:Sanka te khuba ja raju thanara hata
ame parvatone temana vasamam kari rakhya hata, ke temani sathe sanje ane savare allahana namanum smarana kare
ane paksi'one pana bhega tha'i, dareka temani ajnanum palana karata hata
ane ame temana samrajyane majabuta kari didhum hatum ane temane hikamata api hati ane nirnayaka sakti pana api hati
ane sum tamane jhaghado karavavalani khabara mali? Jyare te'o divala kudine meharaba (orada)mam avi gaya

jyare te'o da'uda a.Sa. Pase avya, to te'o temanathi bhayabhita thaya, temane kahyum, bhayabhita na tha'o, ame phariyadana be paksakaro chi'e, amara manthi eke bija para atireka karyo che, basa! Tame amari vacce n'yaya purvaka phensalo kari do ane an'yaya na karaso ane amane satya marga batavi do
(sambhalo)! A maro bha'i che, teni pase navvanum medhi'o che ane mari pase eka ja medhi che, parantu te mane kahi rahyo che ke tari a eka pana mane api de ane vata-citamam tene mane dabavi didho che

temane kahyum, tenum tari pase eka mendhi mangavum, tara para kharekhara atyacara che ane vadhare padata bhagidaro eka-bija para atireka kare che, imanavala ane satkaryo karanara sivaya ane ava loko ghana ocha che ane da'uda a.Sa. Samaji gaya ke ame temani kasoti kari che, pachi to potana palanaharathi maphi mangava lagya ane ajiji karata padi gaya ane vinamrata dakhavi
Basa! Ame pana temano te (vanka) mapha kari didho, kharekhara te'o amari pase ucca darajjavala che ane khuba ja srestha badalo melavanara che

he da'uda! Ame tamane dharati upara nayaba banavi didha, tame loko vacce n'yayapurvaka nirnaya karo ane potani maneccha'onum anusarana na karo, nahito te tamane allahana margathi bhatakavi dese, ni:Sanka je loko allahana margathi bhataki jaya che, temana mate sakhata yatana che, etala mate ke te'o hisabana divasane bhuli gaya che
ane ame akasa ane dharati ane te banne vacceni vastu'onum sarjana amasta ja nathi karyum. Avum anumana to inkara karanara'onum che, inkara karanara'o mate agani kharabi che
sum ame te lokone, je'o imana lavya ane satkaryo karya, temana jeva kari da'isum, je'o dharati upara vidroha karata rahya athava daravavala'one pathabhrasta loko jeva kari da'isum
a pavitra kitaba che, jene ame tamari tarapha etala mate avatarita kari ke loko teni ayato para cintana kare ane bud'dhisali loko tena dvara sikhamana prapta kare
ane ame da'udane sulaimana apya, je khuba ja sara banda hata ane khuba ja jhukavavala hata
jyare temani pase sanjana samaye khuba ja kelavela ghoda lavavamam avya
to kaheva lagya ke, mem mara palanaharani yada same a ghoda'ona premane prathamikata api, tyam sudhi ke suryasta tha'i gayo
te (ghoda'o) ne pharivara mari pase lavo, pachi pindali'o ane gala para hatha pheravava lagya
ane ame sulaimana a.Sa.Ni kasoti kari ane temana sinhasana para eka sarira nankhi didhum, pachi te'o jhuki gaya
kahyum ke he mara palanahara! Mane mapha kari de ane mane evum samrajya apa, je mara pachi ko'inum na hoya, tum khuba ja apanara che
Basa! Ame havane temana vasamam kari didhi, te temana adesa pramane, jyam te'o icchata, tyam naramasathi pahonci jati hati
ane (saktisali) jinnatone pana (temana adhina kari didha), dareka imarata banavanara'one ane dubaki lagavanarane
ane bija jinna'atone pana, je sankalomam jakadayela hata
a che amari bheta, have tum upakara kara athava roki rakha, kami pana hisaba nathi
temana mate amari pase ghani ja nikatata che ane khuba ja srestha thekanum che
ane amara banda aiyuba a.Sa.Num (pana) varnana karo, jyare te'o'e potana palanaharane pokarya ke mane setane ranja ane du:Kha pahoncadyum che
potano paga mara, a snana karava mate ane piva mate thandu pani che
ane ame temane temanum sampurna kutumba apyum, parantu tena jetala ja bija pana, potana taraphathi krpa tarike ane bud'dhisali lokoni sikhamana mate
ane potana hathamam sali'ono eka jhudo la'ine mari do ane soganda na todo, saci vata to e che ke ame tene ghano ja dhirajavana joyo, te khuba ja sadacari vyakti hato ane khuba ja vinamra hata
amara banda ibrahima, is'haka ane yakuba a.Sa.Num pana varnana loko same karo, je'o hatha ane ankhovala hata
ame temane eka khasa vata etale ke akheratani yada sathe khasa kari didha
a badha amari khuba ja nikata ane srestha loko hata
isma'ila, ya-sa-a ane jhul kiphla (a.Sa.)Num pana varnana kari do, a badha sadacari loko hata
a sikhamana che ane kharekhara daravavala loko mate khuba ja sari jagya che
(etale ke hammesa baki rahevavali) jannato, jena dvara temana mate khulla che
jemam (takiya sathe) teko lagavi betha hase ane dareka prakarana phalo ane saraboni iccha karata hase
Ane temani pase nici najarovali sarakhivayani huro hase
a che te vacana, je tamari sathe hisabana divasa mate, karavamam avatum hatum
ni:Sanka roji (khasa) amari krpa che je kyareya samapta thavani nathi
a to badalo thayo, (yada rakho ke) vidroha karanara mate atyanta kharaba thekanum che
jahannama che, jemam te'o jase, ketalum kharaba patharanum che
a che, basa! Tene cakho, garama pani ane parum
te sivaya biji alaga-alaga prakarani yatana
a eka koma che, je tamari sathe (agamam) jase, ko'i svagata temana mate nathi, a loko ja jahannamamam janara che
te'o kahese ke tame ja cho, jemana mate ko'i svagata nathi, tame loko ja ane pahelathi amari same lavya hata, basa! Raheva mateni khuba ja kharaba jagya che
te'o kahese ke he amara palanahara! Jene (inkarano rivaja) amara mate pahelathi ja kadhyo hoya, tena mate jahannamani saja bamani kari de
ane jahannami loko kahese ke, sum vata che ke te lokone apane nathi jo'i rahya, jemane apane kharaba lokomam ganata hata
sum apane ja temani maskari karata hata athava apani najara temana parathi hathi ga'i che
kharekhara jahannami lokono a jhaghado jarura thase
kahi do! Ke, hum to phakta saceta karanaro chum ane eka, vijayi, allaha sivaya ko'i pujya nathi
je akaso, dharati ane je kami te banneni vacce che, te badhano palanahara che. Te jabaradasta ane khuba ja mapha karavavalo che
tame kahi do ke a khuba ja moti vata che
jenathi tame bedarakara tha'i rahya cho
mane te ucca, pratisthita pharista'oni (vatonum) ko'i jnana nathi, jyare te'o takarara kari rahya hata
mari tarapha phakta te ja vahi karavamam ave che ke, hum to spasta rite saceta karanara chum
Jyare tamara palanahare pharista'one kahyum ke hum mati vade manavinum sarjana karavano chum
to jyare hum tene vyavasthita kari la'um ane temam potani ruha phunki da'um, to tame sau teni same sijado karajo
tethi dareka pharista'o'e sijado karyo
parantu iblise (na karyo), tene ghamanda karyum ane te inkara karanara'o manthi hato

(allaha ta'ala'e) kahyum, he iblisa! Tane teni same sijado karavathi kevi vastu'e rokyo? Jenum sarjana mem mara hatho vade karyum. Sum tum ahankari bani gayo che? Athava to ucca darajja vala'o manthi che
tene javaba apyo ke hum ana karata srestha chum, te marum sarjana aga vade karyum ane anum mati vade
adesa apyo ke tum ahinyathi jato rahe, tum dhrtkarelo che
ane tara para kayamatana divasa sudhi mari la'anata ane phitakara che
kaheva lagyo ke mara palanahara! Mane lokona (biji vakhata) jivita thavana divasa sudhi mahetala apa
(allaha ta'ala'e) kahyum, tum te loko manthi che je lokone mahetala apavamam avi
nakki karela muddatana divasa sudhi
kaheva lagyo ke pachi to tari ijajatana soganda! Ni:Sanka hum te saune pathabhrasta karisa
tara te banda'o sivaya, jemane visista kari lidha
kahyum ke satya to a che, ane hum sacum ja kahum chum
ke tane ane tarum anusarana karanara dareka lokothi, hum jahannamane bhari da'isa
kahi do ke hum tamari pase ana mate ko'i valatara nathi mangato ane na to hum balajabari karavavalo chum
a to samagra srstina loko mate spasta sikhamana che
ni:Sanka tame ani satyatane thodanka ja samaya pachi jani leso
